attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Family allowance should only be paid to households with an annual income of less than £50,000.00 per year, People with incomes above should be inelligible, The money saved should be paid to more needy causes.

rejection.details: The title must include a call for action not your name.
reasons: The names of family members of elected representatives or officials of public bodies
